jump_scares.spoiler: Freddy Krueger appears suddenly behind Tina
Rod tackles Glen
Tina runs into Freddy

Freddy crashes through a mirror
A tongue comes out of the phone and licks Nancy

Freddy suddenly jumps out at Nancy
Freddy jumps out from behind Nancy’s bed, just after she has woken from a nightmare. [Video]
Freddy’s hand bursts through the door and grabs Nancy’s mother. [Video]
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
Clara turns the light off and Candyman appears behind her for a brief moment. [Video]
Trevor jumps onto Helen while she is in bed
Helen takes a photo of a door and at the same time, the door opens and a dog barks
Bernie is startled by Helen poking her head through the hole in the wall
Helen closes the medicine cabinet and in the mirror a girl and her dog can be seen
Helen looks into a window and a dog jumps up from the other side
There is an abrupt flashback to a boy screaming
Images of the graffitied head on the wall flash up accompanied by loud noises
Candyman’s hook comes through the medicine cabinet at Helen. [Video]
Helen runs into the living room and sees Bernie’s bloodied body
Candyman’s hand appears above Helen
Candyman’s hook appears in front of the baby
Dr. Burke is stabbed by Candyman
Candyman opens his eyes as Helen is about to attack him
Candyman appears and puts his hand over Helen’s mouth
Helen appears behind Trevor in the mirror. [Video]
Mike Myers climbs onto a car roof
A hand reaches through a window to grab lady

Laurie runs into Sheriff Brackett
A window smashes
Myers steps out from a car

A shadow crosses the bed while Lynda and Bob are in it

Dead Bob swings upside down from a door frame
Myers pops up from behind a sofa
The man that finds the bodies rotates to see Michael Myers behind him
The person wearing the blanket is suddenly jumped at by Michael
Laurie’s father is abruptly attacked by a knife-wielding Michael. [Video]
While the couple are making out, Michael approaches from behind and grabs the boy by the neck
Laurie is grabbed at from behind
Something loud bangs on the door
Michael hits the police officer against the door while Laurie is unlocking it
Michael breaks the car window and grabs Laurie. [Video]
Michael begins to break down the wall
The scene abruptly cuts to Laurie screaming while being wheeled through a hospital
There is a loud bang from the inside of the van
Myers suddenly appears and attacks Buddy from behind
Myers breaks through a window
During a nightmare, hands come up through a table and grab Laurie
Several disturbing quick-cuts during one of Laurie’s nightmares may startle some people
A man dressed as a werewolf is suddenly stabbed in the back by Myers
Myers breaks through the back window of the van and attacks Harley
During a hallucination, Myers suddenly grabs Laurie
Myers appears from behind a tree and attacks a police officer
Deborah and young Myers can be seen in the doorway, several seconds later Myers face can be seen in the mirror as Annie closes the medicine cabinet
There are several short flash-backs to Annie being attacked by Myers
Myers grabs Mya around the head while she in on the phone
Myers begins to pound on the bathroom door
As Laurie gets into a car, Myers appears and grabs the driver
Myers and Loomis burst out of the shed
After Laurie says goodbye to Allyson there is a loud gunshot as the scene abruptly cuts to Laurie shooting some targets
After a boy is left alone in the car by his father, the boy is startled by a bang on the passenger window
A gun discharges after the boy prods the cop lying on the ground
As the boy begins to drive away, Michael appears in the back seat
Ray opens the door startling Karen. Immediately after this Laurie yells “gotcha” on the stairs startling both Ray and Karen
Vicky is startled by her boyfriend (who scares her as a joke) after going outside to empty the trash
Vicky jumps out of Julian’s bedroom screaming (as a joke) after pretending to be abducted
Vicky tries to close the closet door but it won’t close. Suddenly Michael walks out and attacks Vicky
Sheriff Hawkings startles Laurie from behind
The motion sensor light turns back on and Oscar is suddenly attacked by Michael
Ray opens the door to the police car and sees two bloodied and dead police officers
Laurie waits by the door for Michael when his hand suddenly bursts through a glass panel and grabs her
After seeing a trail of blood, Laurie opens a closet door and finds Ray’s dead body
Mike appears from behind one of the mannequins
A hand grabs Julia by her leg
One of Frank’s bodies falls through as door as Kirsty approaches
Kirsty reaches into the box but is suddenly zapped as her hand gets close
Kirsty opens a closet and a Jesus sculpture falls out
A demon appears over Kirsty’s shoulder
An actor for the horror maze jumps out at the girls
Another actor jumps out from behind them
Another actor jumps out from the blue curtains to the left side of the corridor
A robot witch comes out from the wall

One of the park actors scares Natalie with a chainsaw while she’s talking to Gavin
An actor dressed as a clown jumps in front of Natalie and Gavin while they’re walking
The actor standing still turns and screams at Taylor
A cloaked actor jumps in front of group

A mechanical spider drops down from the ceiling in front of Brooke and Quinn
The dead man Ash is looking inside assuming it was a prop suddenly grabs him
One of the actors grabs Taylor and lifts her up
Lights suddenly turn on above the doctor sitting on the chair and he turns to look at the group
The woman on the mattress grabs Ash as he is reaching for the syringe
A hand grabs Brooke from above the fog
One of the hands touches Taylor, frightening her
The lights of a train suddenly turn on behind Ash and Quinn and its horn goes off
The killer bangs on the glass
A light turns on in front of Ash and there is a cut to a growling gargoyle
The killer suddenly opens his eyes as Ash shines the flashlight on him
One of the park actors growls and runs at the group

As Natalie is drying her hair, the camera cuts to the empty bathroom stalls. It then cuts back to Natalie drying her hair and when it cuts to the stalls again the killer is standing right in front of her
The killer’s hand slowly reaches for Natalie’s hair and then suddenly pulls down accompanied by a loud thud sound
A mechanical prop springs out of the box after Brooke says “He’s not in here.

After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer

The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck
